title: Tokens Generated
description: Output of design-ux-token-generator agent - tracks generated token artifacts

files_created.description: List of artifact files created (relative to output_path)

token_counts.description: Count of tokens in each tier

dark_mode_generated.description: Whether dark mode tokens were generated

iteration.description: Which iteration this generation was for

preserved_from_previous.description: Token paths that were preserved from previous iteration
